Class HDBOfficerUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.HDBOfficerUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingManagementUI, EnquiryManagementUI, MenuDisplayUI, ProjectManagementUI
public class HDBOfficerUI extends Object implements ProjectManagementUI, BookingManagementUI, EnquiryManagementUI, MenuDisplayUI
The HDBOfficerUI class defines the command-line interface for officers in the BTO Management System. It supports functions such as registering for projects, viewing assigned or pending projects, managing enquiries, processing bookings, and generating receipts for successful applicants. Interfaces implemented: - ProjectManagementUI - BookingManagementUI - EnquiryManagementUI - MenuDisplayUI

    • HDBOfficerUI

      public HDBOfficerUI(ProjectController projectController, ApplicationController applicationController, EnquiryController enquiryController, OfficerController officerController, AuthenticationController authController, FilterController filterController)
      Constructs a new HDBOfficerUI with the necessary controllers.
      Parameters:
      projectController - controller for handling project-related actions
      applicationController - controller for managing applications and bookings
      enquiryController - controller for managing enquiries
      officerController - controller for officer registration and interaction
      authController - controller for officer authentication and profile checks
      filterController - controller for applying project filters
